The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties.

* 25,26 and 2,2 are numbers and do not represent material properties.
* BTI (Bithiophene-3,3-dicarboximide) is a material name, but it is already included in the "π-core planarity of BTI" property.
* Figure 1 is a figure reference and does not represent a material property.
* n-type polymers is a category or type of material, not a property.
